title: Dawnbringer Riven Visual Bug
body:
Visual bug I am experiencing while with Dawnbringer Riven

Heres a video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5t-LhWOR8LQ&feature=youtu.be

Animation stutters back to place. Any Fix?

replies.body: That actually looks like your connection is having some troubles with some minor packet loss. Do me a favor and test for that really quickly by grabbing the network logs from that game and having this [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Post a screenshot of what it gives you in a reply to me here so I can take a look!
Sorry i didnt reply sooner, I kinda just forgot about it. It is not a packet loss issue. Its a bug affecting everyone who plays riven, It started 2 patches ago.
@broporo i dont think so since multiple riven players on the subreddit was talking about this issue. happens to all of her skins
